data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Massa, Bruno (2017): New genera, species and records of Afrotropical Phaneropterinae (Orthoptera, Tettigoniidae) preserved at the Royal Belgian Institute of Natural Sciences, Bruxelles. Zootaxa 4358 (3): 401-429, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4358.3.1|62 occurrences
